project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API. The program should display the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the function to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the fetched data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement functionality to display weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented functions to ensure that they function correctly
